  • deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha
  • View page source

deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alphaÔÉÅ

Module for anything that an end user would use.

Modules

deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.curvature_blocks

Module for all of the different curvature blocks.

deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.distributions

Module for all distribution implementations needed for the loss functions.

deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.estimator

Defines the high-level Fisher estimator class.

deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.example

Example of running KFAC.

deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.layers_and_loss_tags

A module for registering already known functions for tagging patterns.

deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.loss_functions

Loss functions to be used by LayerCollection.

deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.optimizer

A module for the main curvature optimizer class.

deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.tag_graph_matcher

A module for tagging and graph manipulation.

deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.tests

deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.tracer

Module for the Jax tracer functionality for tags.

deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.utils

Utilities related to multi-device operations.
